text: allahvutaiya arul kotaiyiliruntu yatonraiyum perat tankal caktiyutaiyavarkalallar enru vetattai utaiyavarkal ennik kollatirukkum porutte (ivarrai avan unkalukku arivikkinran) anriyum arul kotaiyellam niccayamaka allahvin kaiyileye irukkinratu, tan virumpiyavarkalukku atanai avan alikkinran - allahve makattana kirupaiyutaiyavan
